timeline.message:
Created options panel for file repository.
File repository is set up during case opening.
Update to use new FileRepository methods.

timeline.bodyText: Was this properties file just not uploaded in another unrelated PR?
timeline.author: dannysmyda
dannysmyda
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@
+OptionsCategory_Name_File_Repository_Options=File Repository
+OptionsCategory_Keywords_File_Repository_Options=File Repository Settings
+FileRepositoryOptionsPanel.addressLabel.text=Hostname or IP Address
+FileRepositoryOptionsPanel.addressTextField.text=
+FileRepositoryOptionsPanel.portLabel.text=Port
+FileRepositoryOptionsPanel.portTextField.text=
+FileRepositoryOptionsPanel.headingLabel.text=Configure the settings for the file repository. Settings can not be changes while ingest is in progress.

timeline.message:
Updated addLocalFile call in Portable Case.
Cleanup.

timeline.bodyText: Given that the panel is disabled while the case is open, can this message be updated again (sorry) to mention that?
timeline.author: dannysmyda
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@

replies.bodyText: Ok wow yeah that is just incorrect.
